pages.title: ⤝ Four of Swords ⤝
pages.text: Spirit of Rest from Strife$(br)     ♃ Jupiter in ♎ Libra

A sword lies resting on a slate peacefully while three swords appear to rise past it, in the night sky.$(br)  Swords rising into the air would hint at a release from pain, as if the situation resolves on its own.$(br)  We might interpret this as information, knowledge, or ideas, rising as weapons for the future while we rest from past battles.

$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Rest, withdrawal, a truce.$(br)  Problems may resolve themselves on their own.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Covetousness, precaution, getting involved.$(br)  Information that leads to action.
